channel.title: VPS Hosting questions
channel.description:
What is the required/minimum amount of...
Bandwith Diskspace Ram Virtual Processors IP
To run a server on a VPS, because I don't want to host one with shitty features, and barely hold anyone on it. I just want something descent, and I'd like the much more experienced to reply. The reason I'm asking is only because I've hosted servers on my computer, but I stopped due to paying for bandwith anyways to my ISP. I'd rather get a VPS just for my RSPS, and just leave it for that purpose only.
I'd also like to know what VPS's that you use for the time being, or you'd use in the future. Most reliable, trustworthy, and efficient.
A little help please?

item.title: VPS Hosting questions
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

Nevermind, I’ve answered all of my own questions. Thanks though, just knew exactly what I need most.

Read full topic

item.title: VPS Hosting questions
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

500mb ram for a 317; google the rest.

Read full topic
